Technique: FAYENCE; GLAZED; PRESSED IN A FORM/MODEL
Name: Drop bead, element of a beaded collar
Description: This floral element (probably imitating a kind of pod) of green faience originally was a part of broad beaded collar. Dating of a separate unprovenanced bead causes a problem, however, necklaces incorporating such pendants were manufactured in abundance in the 18th dynasty.
